ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Dinosaur
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t have a horse yet, but I want to get one for my enchanter. I know it doesn t seem like much, but sometimes, hitting the stand, or Alt-S takes too much
ygData.messageBody:
I don't have a horse yet, but I want to get one for my enchanter. I know it doesn't seem like much, but sometimes, hitting the stand, or Alt-S takes too much time. Especially if there's a bad pull and I need to be on my toes and cast a spell really quick. If I had that horse, I could med while standing. For me, that's worth the money.

Now I just need to go out and make that money, hehe.

 alexander.jones@... wrote:

Ummm ok. Hint inc.....

Have you ever noticed that you draw a lot more aggro sitting than standing
or are you always soloing instead of grouping?



-----Original Message-----
From: Thunder Cat [mailto:Thunder_Cat_4283@...]
Sent: den 10 mars 2003 15:44
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Dinosaur


"I've been told you can med without hitting the sit key..."

Even though that would be nice, is it really worth paying a TON of money
for? LOL. It's not hard enough for me to hit the sit key yet, LOL. I too
would like to know the benefits of a horse.

-= Mippon - Level 40 Druid Halfling =-
